Articles.Content:
I'm playing v1.02 in career mode on the hardest level. The only mod I have installed is Mechjeb. I recently built a space station and put it into orbit around Minmus. It contained a processing lab, ISRU converter, a large fuel storage tank, etc. Shortly after completing my station, I docked a mining ship with ore from Minmus to the station and began processing the ore. While it was processing I exited the game. When I returned the space station had vanished. It cannot be seen from the Tracking Station or in map view (while piloting another ship.) There were two Kerbonauts on board (in the mining ship) that still show up as active in the Astronaut Complex. It still shows them as being aboard the Minmus Space Station although the station seems to be lost. 

Has anyone else experienced a problem like this? Any help will be greatly appreciated as it took quite a while to train these Kerbonauts and to construct this station.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T19:27:14Z" title="05/16/2015 07:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by Schutte**

Please disregard this post. I discovered that Stations were unselected in the Tracking Station and that is I why I could not see it. Duh! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

maybe you just happened to hide a type of vessel (station, ship, or something) that your station belongs to? go tracking station and light up all the small icons on the top of the screen and see whether you still have the problem or not.

EDIT: Right as I guessed - didn't see your post when I replied

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-16T06:23:19Z" title="05/16/2015 06:23  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 16, 2015</time> by FancyMouse**
